forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 6 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun casts its golden hue upon the city, the afternoon in Downtown San Francisco is shaping up to be one of serene beauty. With temperatures floating around 66 degrees, the warmth radiates gently, before tapering off to a cooler 63 as the evening approaches. The west-southwest wind dances through the streets at a brisk 14 mph, occasionally gusting up to 20 mph—an invigorating reminder that the coastal winds are always at play. A layer of soft clouds hovers above, offering a subtle texture to the sky, suggesting that while the day began clear, the evening may usher in a veil of cloudiness, with the night settling at a comfortable 57 degrees.

For those venturing outdoors, a light sweater or jacket will suffice against the cooling breezes as nightfall approaches. Perhaps a stroll along the waterfront is in order, where the paintbrush of sunset reveals a canvas that is both tranquil and exhilarating. The bustling cafes invite a solitary cup of coffee or perhaps an evening snack, allowing one to soak in the lingering warmth before the city lights begin to twinkle. In this moment, one might feel the pulse of san francisco, a city that thrives in its own rhythm, wrapped in the embrace of a breezy evening.
